New Records: LaMelo Ball is on pace to shatter the all-time 4th quarter scoring record set by Russell Westbrook in the 2016-17 season, currently averaging 11.1 points per game in the 4th quarter
Key Match Events: The Charlotte Hornets faced a 64-51 deficit with 6:06 left in the 3rd quarter but turned it around thanks to Brandon Miller's 17 points in the period and LaMelo Ball's clutch performance in the 4th quarter leading to a 103-83 win
Post-Match Reflections: The Hornets' slow start and ability to overcome a deficit to secure the win was a key point in the match reflection
Others: LaMelo Ball's 58.2 percent shooting and 50 percent three-point shooting in the 4th quarter were notable statistics in the match
